Going forward, we remain committed to aggressive investment in both our people and our products as we pursue an innovation agenda. Announcing financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2010. Google reported revenues of$ 7.29 billion for the quarter ended September 30, 2010, an increase of 23% compared to the third quarter of 2009
